name: Heightened Senses
description:
Game Description

Heightened Senses is a top down shooter game where monsters and ghosts are trying to kill you.

Rules

You have to kill monsters and ghosts to survive. Be careful, you can only see and slaughter ghosts while your heightened sense is active. 

Controls

W A S D : Move

Left Click : Shoot

Space : Toggle heightened sense

Credits Assets
  • Sprites & tiles by Kenney.
Sound
  • Music by Tallbeard Studios.
  • SFX by Kenney.
Font
  • Pixel font by Kenney.
